title: CMHT KPIs Dashboard
text:
Overview
This dashboard presents key performance indicators (KPIs) for the Waterdeep Community Mental Health Team (CMHT). The data is organized into three main categories:

Staffing KPIs
Referral and Access KPIs
Safety KPIs

Click on the links above or use the navigation menu to explore each category of KPIs.
For detailed definitions of all KPIs, please refer to the KPI Definitions page.
Data last updated: Aug 2024
